mapper.select: select service_id as serviceId,detect_company as detectCompany,detect_object as detectObject, detect_project as detectProject,detect_price as detectPrice,detect_time as detectTime, detect_standard as detectStandard,detect_score as detectScore FROM service WHERE detect_company = #{detectCompany}

select order_number as orderNumber,service_id as serviceId,detect_company as detectCompany,detect_object as detectObject, detect_project as detectProject,detect_price as detectPrice,detect_time as detectTime, detect_standard as detectStandard,user_name as userName, create_time as createTime FROM order_total WHERE 1=1 and detect_company = #{detectCompany} Order by create_time desc
